fruits.name: Razz Berry
fruits.description: Feed this to a Pokémon, and it will be easier to catch on your next throw.

fruits.name: Pinap Berry
fruits.description: Feed this to a Pokémon to make it drop more candy.

fruits.name: Nanab Berry
fruits.description: Feed this to a Pokémon to calm it down, making it less erratic.

fruits.name: Golden Razz Berry
fruits.description: Feed this to a wild Pokémon to make it much easier to catch. Feed this to a Pokémon on a Gym to fully restore its motivation.

fruits.name: Silver Pinap Berry
fruits.description: Feed this to a Pokémon to receive more Candy when you catch it and make it easier to catch.
